text: Saya pernah menginap disini, waktu itu ambil yg 5 bedrooms villa. Ya lumayan enak menghabiskan waktu untuk merayakan tahun baru 2018 waktu itu. Kebersihkan kamar cukup. Ada 1 kamar utama d lantai 2 sangat luas sekali, tp saya AC saat itu tidak dingin. Beberapa lantai kayu dekat kolam renang sudah mulai lapuk dan anda harus berhati2. Untuk pelayanan perlu ditingkatkan, Senyum & Sapa tidak ada. Saat check-in tidak ada staf yg stand by di lobby. Breakfast tidak banyak pilihan. Untuk bagian taman sangat luas dengan view pantai.
title: Kurang Ramah

text: Saya menginap di sana sekitar tahun 2010. Saya sangat menyukai vilanya. Hanya saja, tak begitu banyak pilihan di situ. Pantainya sedikit kotor dan perlu supir untuk menuju tempat lain. Secara keseluruhan, pegalaman saya di sana sangatlah baik tapi itupun karena vila ataupun perjalanan saya ke luar. Tak banyak tempat untuk dikunjungi. Intinya, saya sungguh menyukai tempat ini. Para staf serta supirnya pun sangat baik hingga kami senang di sana. Saya tak tahu apakah mungkin untuk meninggalkan pesan untuk saya jika Anda ingin melihat foto-fotonya.
title: Tempat yang Indah:)

text: Saya menginap di sini di vila #4 selama 2 bulan, Maret dan April. Ini merupakan yang terbaik dari semua vila di daerah yang kami kunjungi. Dilengkapi furnitur terbaru, kelambu dan lain-lain serta taman yang indah. Paket menginap termasuk jasa pembantu lengkap, tukang kebun dan pemeliharaan kolam. Lokasinya sangat bagus, sekitar 20 menit berkendara menuju Sanur, Ubud, dan Candidesa. Pantainya cocok untuk berselancar namun kami lebih memilih untuk bersantai di vila. Restoran di tepi pantai menyediakan bir Bintang dan kami sering menikmati pemandangan ombak di sini. Saya pasti akan kembali lagi ke sini.
title: Persinggahan Liburan yang Fantastis

text: i stayed 2 nights in the beachfront villa, the staffs was so polite, friendly, and helpful. the y offered me upgrade my room into three bedroom and its very huge villa. the space is so spacious and excellent for family. the view was so so beautiful. the villa has complete facilities and amenities. the breakfast was delicious. the double room on the 2nd floor is what i love the most, the room has balcony and many windows so it feels so close to the ocean  The private pool is big, long, and warm !! the kids really enjoyed the pool . the location is perfect to experience the beauty of Keramas beach. the property is a real paradise and we will comeback someday.
title: Fabulous !!

text:
Property/ Ambience: 4/5
Villa with private pool: Spacious place, large room. Pool is well maintained water pumped regularly. Large sitout for family with tv on ground floor a plus. Balcony on first floor also has a partial view of ocean.
Services: 4/5 
Staff are courteous, timely and effecient. The pool had inflatable rings missing, gave feedback to director, got instant reply and rings next day. Which is good.
Transportation: 2/5
The place is tied with some local car service, the rates are high. 1/3 more than outside. Would recommend others to check with some car vendors in advance (at least week or more, as they get booked early) and tying up for good package for all days here. You would save average minimum 50-60 USD for every 4 days on road. More if you are a couple and don't need 5 seater.
Food: 2/5
The breakfast choices are very limited, mainly revolving around eggs, also overall main course menu is also limited. As this place is a bit on side, many restaurants do not deliver here. There is a swan restaurant nearby, but after a full day sightseeing, goi g out is cubersome. Having their own kitchen will be a definitive plus or tying up to restaurants and having their menu handy to deliver at place is needed.
Tailor made services: 
Their original hotel website had many things, barbeque, DVD, games console. Enquiring at reception gave blank responses. Either these should be removed from site or staff made aware of same.

Overall its a great place, if the food selection is increased, I am sure, people would be happy to give 5 start ratings
title: Great property and staff

photos.caption: Viila suite, private pool with sit out

text: We had a lovely stay at Bali Diamond Villas.  The villas were a great size and had everything we needed.  The pool was fantastic our girls had an absolute ball!  We walked down the beach to Kommune Beach Club a few times and also went to Warung Legong which was fantastic too.  Not alot to do in walking distance but easy enough to get a driver to take you anywhere you want to go.  We went to Bali Safari and Marine Park which is just about 5-10 mins down the road and also some art galleries. Other than that we were happy just relaxing by the pool.  Unfortunately breakfast was fairly average but hey not the end of the world.  Also just make sure you don't leave lights on when you go out as mozquitos can sneak in.  Overall a lovely stay.
title: Family Break

text:
We stayed in 2 beachfront villas at Bali Diamond Villas in Keramas. If you are after beachfront you will not be disappointedhere! The staff were attentive and arranged  massages and manicures in house for us. They have a food menu that you can order off which our kids enjoyed. Breakfast was included and was basic but saw us through to lunch. Each villa has its own private pool. 
We loved the Keramas as it was quiet, great surf and not crowded at all. Some great places to eat around as well (definitely try Warong Legong - free shuttle and Warong Locas - on the beach)
Definitely recommend to stay here.
title: Absolute Beachfront

text:
We spent 4 nights at Villa 9. Great sized large villa. Great pool and outside area. Transport through villa for collection at the airport was great.

Great access to the beach and surf spots nearby carparks and kfc and not far from Keramas and Komune. 

Food choices limited nearby. Breakfast was great. Fresh fruit and scrambled eggs great. Room service was ok.

Pillows could be nicer but if you like big pillows you will be ok.

Would we go back - yes we had a great couple of days.
title: Couples Getaway

text: What an amazing place to stay with the family. Being a surfer and Keramas beach hosting one of the best beach breaks in Bali it’s a sensational place to stay. Clean, happy staff and we can’t failt the location.
title: Shane

text: Bali Diamond Villas are great villas. They are in an excellent location. The staff are very friendly and helpful. There are beautiful views from the ocean front villas. We look forward to our next stay.
title: Great villas. Excellent location

text:
Everything you could expect from a regular resort anywhere in the world.

Does not have the Balinese spirit...

Not quiet as they would like, but there das a wedding during muito stay and could not have dinner at healthy restaurant... they should have said that earlier and not only at check in...
title: Not Bali spirit...

text:
Been a few months since being there but just saw the pictures and just had to leave a review. Billy made sure all our needs were taking care off. We stayed in Villa nr 7 which has a beach pool, and 3 en suite bedrooms. Great for staying with larger groups. Not very kid friendly, if you have kids smaller than 3 that walk around. But perfect for kids that are a little bit older. 

The food was great, we even wanted to get a bottle of champagne for a birthday and it was arranged quickly. 

Overall definetly coming back when coming to bali. Just some relaxation and no crazy party people.
title: Diamond in the rough.. Especially if you love surfing.

text: The staff was very accomodating. The breakfast was amazing. The pool and grounds are lovely. The rooms were super cozy. it was a great value and perfect for us and our friends. It was one of our best vacation !!!
title: Superb, It was one of our best vacation !!!

text: if you love quiet beautiful beach front living with uncrowded waves this place is perfect for you .. i have stayed here with my wife over a dozen times and have had family and friends stay here and they love it.. no traffic no crazy clubs or noise . its like going back in time to what bali was 30 years ago .. will definitely be going back.. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND  everyone who goes to bali owes them selfs a night or 2 get away to this place
title: uncrowded surf at your doorstep amazing villas VERY RELAXING

owner_response.text:
Thanks for this review. We love having repeat customers as yourself and pride ourselves that you choose Bali Diamond Villas on a continual basis.

Thanks for mentioning the surfing as guests literally have a surf break at their doorstep, and two more fantastic breaks within a 5 min walk.

We so our grateful you noticed the serene environment at Bali Diamond. It sure is nice waking up to birds chirping and waves rolling in on the beach.

See you next time!
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
The villa 1 is big, nice but not well cleaned.
Beautiful view but unfortunately a lot of garbage in front of the garden:( 
You don't won't to go for a swim then.
Swimming pool is very nice.
Buy all you would need before coming as there is nothing around.
title: Nice pool but nothing to do

text:
For those of you looking for a remote villa away from all the hustle and bustle of busy Ubud...this is the perfect Villa for you! It's new, clean, modern and perfect for families. We rented the 2-bedroom Villa and loved the fact it had 2.5 bathrooms. Breakfast came to our room every morning on time and very fresh. We loved the food we ordered throughout the day as well:) There is also a wonderful restaurant called 'Komune' just an 8 minute walk away. 

The customer service at Bali Diamond was superb!!! Darwin and Wayan were exceptional and so helpful with everything! Anik is amazing! Anik answered my many questions leading up to the trip via email and was so patient and sweet. It was a pleasure to finally meet her in person when we arrived:) Des was our driver for the time we were in Bali and he was amazing! Very patient, a great driver and I highly recommend him! We will forever remember our amazing trip because of you all! Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!
title: Beachfront Villa

text: Stayed at Bali diamond villas for 7 days and we are very pleased with the villa we rented (2 bedroom) It was a bit far from everything but to us is what we are looking for. Away from party streets and quite. The private pool was excellent. We have a driver that comes and takes us around everyday. A good breakfast was provided. We were happy customers and would definitely go back and take the whole of the family and we will rent villa 4 with 5 bedroom.
title: Great Holiday Place ++ Friendly & Accommodating Staff

text:
My boys and I wanted somewhere to chill for a few days before joining others at a Nusa Dua resort - which would be go go go. This was a perfect option for us. 

The villa was spacious - over 3,000 sq ft - over 2 floors with a lovely garden and our own private pool. Very luxurious. The kitchen was well equipped, stove, utensils, fridge, microwave.  Only thing it lacked was washer/dryer facilities. There were TVs in 2 of the 3 bedrooms all with cable. Wifi was strong and constant. Breakfast was truly average, but that's ok. No big deal. 

We had a private masseuse come to the villa - very very nice. It was awesome having a massage with the ocean sounds right outside. So so relaxing.  

We booked car transport from the airport through Bali Diamond and our driver was AWESOME. His name was Madi and we used him for all our trips over the 3 days we stayed. We did a short trip to Ubud for white water rafting and he was great showing us sights on the way. A good guy. 

The villas are a little out of the way, but right on the very unique black sand beach. The waves are perfect for surfers but not patrolled so kids need to be careful. It's quite undiscovered and no real swimmers on the beach. About 100m north is the Komune - a large modern hotel/resort which has a good restaurant and a very cool surfer vibe. 

Bali Diamond Villas is a "diamond in the rough" -- comfortable and great for a group.
title: Tranquil and spacious. A diamond in the rough

text: With two surf breaks outside it's great for the surfers in the family.  It's a quiet and beautiful area.  Close enough to everything but far enough to be out of the craziness. The villa is clean and spacious. We really enjoyed our holiday there
title: Great location

text:
From the moment we arrived one of the rooms inside the villa was smelling really bad, we didn't know why... And tonight was our last night and from 1am until sunrise we couldnt sleep at all due to the noise from bats on the roof. Now we know the reason of the smelly rooms.
Will never come back to this place
title: Very disappointed, bats inside rooms

text: Beach villa, very nice, private pool, gate on to beach, very comfortable. My wife and I wanted a Bali vacation away from the tourist crowds, at the beach and not too far for day trips to the south and central Bali locations. A 300 yard walk down the beach brings you to the famed Keramas break, there is a great little warung to sit at and watch the surfing. Great staff, good internet, and the staff was able to suggest an internet solution which allowed me to connect with my office in spite of the blanket internet censure in Indonesia. The driver sent by the hotel to pick us up at the airport was a great resource for day trip transportation, and an occasional evening outing to a restaurant. All in all a great find to stay on the next visit.
title: Great out of the way place for a quiet vacation

text:
Our family of 5 stayed in Villa 8 for almost 2 weeks. It was a great accommodation with warm, polite staff that were ready to help in anyway possible.

The kids loved having our private pool and having breakfast delivered daily. Within a 10 minute walk, there are several restaurants and the Komune Resort that has a nice menu at their outdoor restaurant. Our favorite find was Warong Legong restaurant, which offered a comprehensive menu at super reasonable prices. (Warong Legong will deliver to Bali Diamond.)

The villa was extremely spacious and comfortable. Housekeeping came daily and were very accommodating. We were spoiled with in-room massages and manicure/pedicures.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Bali Diamond!
title: Wonderful stay

text:
I stayed two nights at Villa 9 spacious with an amazing sight.
Cutlery and cooking is very full, very helpful for the villa is quite far from the city.
Private pool was very pleasant ...
The breakfast menu needs to be added variations. Services are very satisfactory although with limited personnel. Thanks, Bali Diamond Estates & Villas.
title: Superb

text:
If you're looking to be in the party zone, this is not the place. It's a very quiet beach area about 45 minutes from denpasar and an hour from Kuta Beach. 20 minutes from Sanur. 

The prices are reasonable and much cheaper than Kuta or Sanur. The staff is excellent. The food was good at a much cheaper rate than Sanur or Kuta. 

My only complaint was that they advertise being on the beach, but the 3 bedroom villa was one row in. But it's only a 1 minute walk, so not a big deal. The beach is way cleaner than Sanur or Kuta.
title: Really nice place away from the crowds

text: Great place for families. Each villa has its own compound including a pool. Must  love open concept living. We had breakfast included in our stay. Don't get Villa C. We had a cats who kept coming back. Not a cat fan. Make sure house keeping cleans under the bed, sofa, etc. other than that it's awesome place. Staff is amazing. Black sand beach could be cleaned up, lots of trash. It's about a 45 minute ride from town but worth it not being in the busy parts of town. Awesome, awesome, awesome place to stay. Highly recommended.
title: Bali Diamond Villas

text: Highly recommended. We stayed with seven people including 2 young children in the 5 bedroom villa. Friendly staff and absolutely amazing villa.  Super clean and amazing rooms with on suites.  Great AC wifi.
title: Great place to stay

text:
I stayed at Bali Diamond Villas for the last day of my trip so that I can relax and enjoy the luxury and the view.
But I was disappointed with the services and the management skills of staff.
Pros:
1. The view is great and so is the decor.
2. Pool was clean and quite big.
3. Clean rooms.
4. kitchen is well equipped to even host a party. (Bring your own food/material)
5. Beautiful beech 

Cons:

1. FOOD was so below average and the location is a bit far from the market place, only thing I was able to finish was the fruit juice. Since the nearest market area was not so approachable by walking I was starving most of the times, It seemed like the they don't have any on site chef available. Menu was so small that we tasted everything and hated it as well. IF I WANTED TO EAT FROZEN FOOD I WOULD HAVE COOKED SOMETHING BETTER THEN WHAT YOOU OFFERED. The villas are so nicely built but with the secluded location and bad food I somehow felt trapped rather then relaxed.
 I would like to suggest the future guests that they should buy some instant food on their way to the villas and enjoy the view and the pool.

2. No doorbell at the villa so the staff just entered unannounced sometimes, that was a bit uncomfortable for me.
I would recommend the management that a door bell will be a great addition to the villa and privacy of guests.

3. The villa I stayed at was not really prepared before head, The coffee mugs, cutlery and some basic stuff in the kitchen was not clean at all. Since the rest of the villa was so clean that seemed like a missed spot.

The mattress for sun loungers were oddly left at the entrance of villas. It was not only strange to look at when you enter the villa as there are 5-6 mattress lying just in front of the door( that is the first thing I saw when I entered the villa) but I was confused if the staff wanted me to arrange those mattresses by myself or were they not expecting us to sit there. It was unprofessional. 

4. The staff need some training, all the staff is very nice and even with language barrier they were trying their best to help us whenever required. But still some professional training is required. 

Message to the hotel: I hope you take my review in consideration and make some changes. I would love to come back and enjoy the view if nothing else.
title: THE VILLA WAS GREAT BUT THE SERVICE WAS NOT ABLE TO MATCH

text:
What an incredible and peaceful stay! The rooms are huge and luxurious!  The swimming pool is to die for and overlooks the black volcanic sand beach, really such an incredible sight.  The staff are all so kind and helpful and all went well out of their way to make us all happy and comfortable! 
Is a bit far from all the touristy sites, but perfect for a tranquil and relaxing vacation!
title: Absolutely Blissful!

text: I booked this as a 1 bedroom online at Expedia. However, when I got there they explained they are all 3 bedroom and they locked the other two rooms so I only had access to the Master bedroom. This was fine with me and I got a great deal on an oven front with a private pool. It was quiet and very relaxing falling asleep to the sounds of the waves.
title: Nice beach front villa

text:
I stayed here for one night in Villa B during Bali Marathon. 

The villa is adequate enough to accomodate us for one night. The furniture is a bit outdated but overall it is clean and very quiet. 

The pillows on the upper bathroom are very stiff and there are loud geckos outside. So if you are a light sleeper don't choose the upper bedroom. 

Breakfast is quite good and service is excellent. I will definitely come back and stay here again but may choose the newer villa.
title: Average Villa

text: We were a group of 5 including 2 kids aged 10 and 8. Wanted to look for a quiet, large place and somewhere near to the beach which could accommodate all of us. After searching for quite some time we finally settled for Diamond due to the reviews. We're not disappointed. The villa was fully equipped. The staff were helpful and friendly. The kids simply loved the private pool. Recommended.
title: First time in Bali first stay in Diamond

text:
We decided to see more of Bali and chose the east coast Keramas. Last minute accommodation wasn't easy so we decided on a private villa .We stayed in number 8 Bali Diamond villas with my son and husband. Our villa was extremely large , 3 big bedrooms with bathrooms . 1 downstairs 2 upstairs. A very steep staircase  with no railing was a bit of  a concern .These villas are beachfront , unfortunately the only time you see the view is from the top balcony. The surf was large and great to hear and watch. If you sit on a beach chair right at the end of the property you can enjoy the view. Black sand quite sparkley not inviting for swimming. I really did enjoy this area with traditional rice paddies .Nice for a walk out the back. Bali Diamond do not have a restaurant the two closest are ok but the Komune is walking distance  ,10 min on beach, fabulous food and great spa you can also use there beachfront pool. The walk can be a bit hard if it's high tide but we hopped up to the beach club walkway . There is a dolphin pool nextdour not impressed 4 dolphins in a large pool , tourist attraction. 
After 6 nights we felt rested and the villa has a beautiful pool. Great villas for 3 couples ,note number 8 ..top bedroom bed squeaks on slightest movement which was really disruptive , air conditioner is outside the other bedrooms and it cuts in and out, I think all villas are individually owned. I probably wouldn't stay that long again but it did give us the opportunity to go and visit Candi Dasa which was a beautiful area an hour away. Keramas is more traditional Bali if you want peace and quiet and love surfing this place is all that. Staff are very helpful and nice at Diamond Villas.
title: Holiday

text:
I stayed at Bali Diamond Villas last week and absolutely loved it! It’s located right on Keramas beach which was perfect for my boyfriend who surfs- it was his favorite stay of the entire trip! The beach was relatively empty even though it’s peak season, and the location was very quiet, a welcome change from the hustle & bustle of Seminyak, etc. There are a few bars and restaurants if you walk down the beach, but it’s an overall very laid-back and quiet location.

The staff was very friendly and attentive. Although it’s a luxury villa it had a laid-back family vibe, not pretentious at all. The staff was very helpful in arranging in-villa spa treatments for us (amazing), a driver to take us around Ubud, and complimentary hot breakfast each morning at a time specified by us. There is no restaurant on site but you can order from a local restaurant through the villa office and they will deliver it to your villa- great food!

We were in the 3-bedroom ocean view villa which was very nice. The two bedrooms on the main floor each have an indoor shower as well as an outdoor shower, and the upstairs master bedroom is HUGE with a nice balcony with ocean views. The pool was very nice as well! The villa is surrounded by a stone wall, very private which was great. There was someone to clean and change the towels every day so the villa was absolutely spotless. We did take a look at the beachfront villas which were AMAZING. Very luxurious with a huge backyard/pool area right on the beach. The interiors were flawless. If you are looking for a very luxurious stay right on the beach, definitely pick the beachfront villas- you will not be disappointed.

Overall I loved Bali Diamond Villas and will definitely be back! Very well maintained grounds, excellent location, and amazing staff. I would recommend to families who are looking for a quiet getaway, or surfers who want a great stay right on a world-class surf break.
title: Quiet & luxurious getaway on Keramas

owner_response.text:
Greetings Shannon,

Thank-you for this outstanding review. This is exactly the service we try to provide to our guests. "luxury in a comfortable setting", and I am ecstatic to know we were able to provide that atmosphere during your stay with us. I hope you will visit us again soon. 

Please contact me personally at: director@balidiamondvillas.com for your next stay with us!
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Last minute booking. Very nice clean villa directly on black diamond beach. Very late arrival was met with welcoming staff arranging for our breakfast. Limited English by some staff but plenty to get the job done. Friendly staff arranged a last minute excursion for us. Definitely recommend!
title: Nice villa on beautiful beach!

text:
This is one of the Diamond In The Rough Villa in Bali. It is really away from the City Centre and you can enjoy your own 'private' beach fronting villa. The one that we stayed is the same as the picture. The villa itself is a terrace type with 3 bedrooms. 1 on the ground and 2 rooms on the first floor. The first thing you notice is the villa itself. The owner has taste in decorating. The living room / kitchen is the central area of the villa and you can see the private lap pool, and smaller 'Jacuzzi' from this area. this area also has folding doors that opens to the pool / backyard / beach which makes it more enjoyable staying at this place and observe the sunrise from the decks.

The bedroom on the ground floor is the best bedroom since you have the outdoor shower which adds to the ambiance of the whole villa. While the two rooms on the 1st floor also had the advantage of waking up facing and looking at the sunrise while the other rooms is near to a veranda that is use for sunbathing.

The villa come some basic service. Breakfast is served daily with limited menu (Not Majlis Ulama Indonesia Halal) and for limited persons. Not sure whether we can order extra for extra charges. They also offer private laundry service (and its really affordable). Since this place is far away from any shop, my advice is for you to bring some food and drinks (especially water) before you stay in the villa. If you plan just to relax and not going anywhere, then make sure you have plenty. 

Having said that, the villa also provide of getting a takeaway services from any place (with their friendly staff). We were only sticking to fast food since most fast food outlets in Bali is Majlis Ulama Indonesia Certified (which is a plus). So make sure you have plenty of cash and plenty of time since it takes a while for them to buy the food. (Not sure whether delivery service even reach this place).

Cellphone services is intermittent but the free WiFi does help. The coverage area reach the pool / backyard area which I find really useful and utilise my tablet while enjoying the breeze and serene beach scene.

If you had the chance to go the beach, please make sure you have the right footwear since the sand near the gate of the villa are littered with left over construction materials (fragments of stone / glass / cement) that is no fault of the villa operator. But once you are near to the sea, its like any other beach around Bali, clean and serene. The only different is the beach has black / silver sand.

The area to the left of the villa has a beach fronting restaurant (Not sure if its Halal), so we did not venture to the place and if you stroll further, you will come across a hotel / beach house that is dedicated to surfers. They even have lights for surfers to surf at night! You can see a few surfers waiting in the sea for the right wave.

In summary, this is the villa that is worth every penny. Quite, beautiful, serene beach, which reminds you this is the real Bali that you have been missing all this years.
title: The Best Villa Away From City

text: Nice villa and beautiful beach. Its located at keramas beach. The villa has 3 bed rooms, nice swimming pool, good internet service. The beach is right in front of the villa. After giving consultation, physical examination and medicines for my patient here, actually i would like to jump to the pool, but maybe i will do it next time, because my next patients, already waiting. Well i would say this is a good villa for those who needs privacy
title: Enjoy the day

text:
We stayed in a 3 bedroom villa (Villa #2) with our room facing the beach. Location is very far from the Seminyak/Kuta area (if that's what you're looking for) and is 30 mins away from Sanur. A great place for a 2 night stay to get away from the hustle of the rest of touristy Bali.

The beach has black sand that glitters in the sunlight as well as moonlight so perfect for taking scenic photos.

The villa has a food delivery menu but if you want good food, i'd recommend Komune Beach Resort's cafe.

The villa is very accessible from the main road
title: Clean modern villa with excellent service!

text: Overall the villa is clean-ish.. The only thing Im complaining about is the bathroom design.. We stayed in a 5 bedrooms villa. It was a twin bedded room but the bathroom is total transparent to all.. Including the shower room.. No blinds or curtain there.. In all the 5 bedrooms with no door or total transparent shower room.. I guess yo need to look at privacy at a different level ... You may refer to the picture .. I took that picture outside of the bathroom.. The breakfast provided was edible but could have been a much better experience.. The pool was great size and the rest of the place is spacious.. Only accessible when you have a car..
title: Would try something else..

text: my girlfriend and I spent two weeks in villa one. Service was great everyone was so helpful and friendly, fresh towels and sheets everyday, organised transport and day tours and massages in the villa for us when we wanted, nice and quiet, beautiful outdoor area, all it needed was a cockail list they could make on site
title: great villa to stay in

text:
My partner and I had a three night stay at villa #7. Overall, the stay was decent for the price, but there are some things I thought the management and future guests need to be aware of. 

I'll nonetheless begin with the positives first.

The staff was exceptionally friendly, from receiving us, to buying food from a nearby restaurant for us, to delivering our breakfasts and finally at check out. This is one area the property was very strong in and it surely helped enhanced our stay immensely.

The outdoor garden and pool attached to each villa were beautiful. Garden was well maintained, with comfortable sun tanning decks that allowed us to just lie in the sun for hours. Pool was huge by usual villa standards (about 10 meters long), and was good for morning swims or just relaxing in the water.

The not-so-positives:

For a property touting itself as luxury beachfront villas, the interior of villa #7 was rather bland, which took much away from the luxury element of our trip. Note that each villa in the property is privately owned and their designs vary from one to the next. Do check out the property's photos for each of the villa and request for the one that you want prior to your trip. This was something we failed to do. We saw the photos from booking.com and assumed that that was what we were booking. In the end, villa #7 looked nothing like what the photos on booking.com showed. Remember, check the property's own website for a more accurate preview of what you are getting. 

The property is located on the eastern coast of Bali, an approximately 1-1.5hr drive from the airport. This may fit the needs of travellers who look for peace and quiet, away from the hustle and bustle of Kuta. It was fine for us too, but future guests should be aware of this. In addition, there are limited food options and conveniences such as minimarts in the vicinity. 

The negatives:

The furnishing and facilities in the villa need urgent replacements. I get it that beachfront properties tend to be easily worn out by virtue of being ocean-facing. But I am bewildered by the amount of rust INSIDE the villa. Curtain holders, gas stoves, and even the television and hairdryer were RUSTY (!?). Yes some rust do not affect the functionality of these equipment, but luxury villa it is not. The hairdryer looked so old and dirty that my partner had to stay up for at least an hour to dry her hair under the (oh yes) rusty fan. There were also stains in the toilets.

Finally, the linen provided was also not up to standard. Stains were found on the bed sheet, pillow cases and towels.

In conclusion, the friendly staff, beautiful garden and spaciousness of the property makes it a decent one for its price. But the upkeep of the villa, at least villa #7, needs to be improved immediately should it aspire to play in the league of the truly luxurious.

Future guests are advised to take note of these before choosing this property.
title: Extremely friendly staff but villa leaves much to be desired

text: We got free upgrade to five rooms villa when we booked with three rooms villa.  Beach view, private pool! Free breakfast everyday! Free wifi! We were there for 5 days 4 nights. The keramas beach is very quiet and a bit isolated and outskirts compare to Kuta area. Good for family gathering and relaxation. The staffs are very attentive to our needs. Good service. Highly recommended!
title: Wonderful villa!

text:
We stayed in one of the deluxe ocean view villas, and hade one of the most amazing vacation ever. The villa is so luxery with a nice pool and the best view at the black beach in front. The master bedroom is so lovely, like a honeymoon suite.
So much thanks to the whole staff especialy to Ms Arie who made our stay possible and Wayan for the best service.
we will come back next year for sure.
title: Perfect holidays

text:
Bali Diamond Villas were amazing- located right on the beach, with amazing views of ocean. The staff was welcoming and willing to go out of their way to make our stay a great one, and spent time sending us to all the adventures we were interested in. They took the time to make us delicious balinese and american style breakfasts, were happy to connect us to local sightseeing spots, and even watched our luggage in the office when we checked out. It was amazing to wake up, have breakfast delivered, eat outside and watch famous surfers ride the waves, and then order masseuses to come to our villa and give us pool side massages and facials. 

We went on various day tours, and the drivers we were connected to via Bali Diamond were polite and knew how to navigate the entire island with ease- this is highly recommended, and very inexpensive! The villas are conveniently close to the Bali Marine Safari Park, as well as Surfer's Beach and even the bigger resorts and more touristy areas, yet the pace of life was relaxing and peaceful. 

Overall, it was an amazing get-a-way, with a balance of relaxation away from the big cities, but close enough that we could easily get to all of the touristy spots within 15-20 minutes. 

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
title: Relaxing Vacation at Bali Diamond Villas

text: Best place I could've stayed during my 2 week trip to Bali. Billy and his staff were incredibly welcoming and attentive to every need and desire during my stay. No complaints, highly highly recommend!
title: Incredible all-around experience

text: Came to Bali for my birthday with my girlfriend and spent the first few nights here. It was idyllic. The property is nicely situated between major towns so you have privacy but they have everything you need right there and the hectic Bali action is only a few minutes away by cab. The beachfront villa was huge, well maintained and really well designed. The staff came in every morning with fresh breakfast and were on hand all the time for whatever we wanted. 5 star hotel quality service in a private villa, awesome experience. This place would be perfect for families, groups of friends, couples...pretty much anybody. Will definitely stay here again the next time we visit Bali, and we're already looking forward to it
title: Awesome place to stay in Bali

text: This was our first time in Bali and definitely not our last! The deluxe ocean view villa we stayed in was beyond our expectations. It was beautiful, clean, well maintained and had a breathtaking view. All the villas are gorgeous! I did a lot of research about places to stay in Bali before we decided on this area and this villa and I am glad we stayed here! We wanted to surf, play on a clean and safe beach without the crowds, and enjoy the beauty of Bali. If you want to be around a lot of people/noise/restaurants/traffic, go to Kuta. The location is perfect if you like to have a low key, relaxing vacation. The beach here is amazing (beautiful black diamond beach!) if you like to surf without the crowds. The breakfast each morning was included in our rate and were delicious! I think they are working on opening a restaurant on site but you can order room service from 9-5. They also offer very reasonably priced 1 or 2 hr massages in your villa. All 3 masseuses I had were top notch. The staff here are very energetic and friendly, and go the extra mile to help you with anything you need. Service tax is less (5% instead of the regular 11%) than other places so you can tip a staff member for a job well done! They can arrange a driver to take you anywhere you want to go. We needed pick up/drop off airport service which was scheduled with ease.  Our driver was friendly, and very professional. Thank you Ms Arie and all the amazing Bali Diamond Staff!! We hope to see you all again next time!
title: Heaven!

text: A luxury beachfront villa complex nestled between famous Komune night surfing and upcoming Komaneka resort. Pantai Keramas is a beautiful black sand beach with a sparkling diamond and is  a world class surfing destination.We stay in villa no 4 which has 5 bedrooms and has the best and biggest swimming pool and garden right in front of Keramas beach. It is a perfect place for wedding venue. Each bed room has a king size comfy bed, very clean and top class amenities just like a five star hotel. The master bed room is located on the second floor with a gorgeous view of the beach and the nusa penida island. It is equipped with a beautiful bathtub, marble shower room and big terrace, very lovely and perfect for couple. Finally, We would like to thank ms. Arie and ms. Putri for all the warm hospitality and excellent guest service during our stay.
title: Million dollar Row in Keramas

text:
I would like to give my highest appreciation to Ms. Arie and all the staffs at Bali Diamond. I was having a wedding in a church near by and booked 3 villas for our family, a party of 28 persons, consisted of 17 adults, 9 kids and 2 babies. The entire process from booking to check out were so smooth. Ms. Arie kindly revert to all of my inquiries sent via email, phone or what's app messenger. I asked and bothered her with hundreds of questions and chat and she always responded very well. 
All of our family members loved the villa, its setting and services. The kids really enjoyed the pool and the beach. One of the kid even asked his mom to extend for onr more week there! The pretty pictures in their website do not lie. The villa, backyard, pool, beach, sunrise are all very beautiful. The bedroom and bathroom and villa's interior are also of good quality and very well maintained.
We also ordered a dinner service with our choice of menu, and we really satisfied with the food and the service. The staffs were also very nice and attentive and keep asking if they can be of any service. They also surprised us by sending a flower arrangement to congratulate my wedding! 
Thank you Bali Diamond, our stay with you was so enjoyable, memorable and remarkable.
title: Top Notch!

photos.caption: Sunrise seen from villa#4 master bedroom

text:
The Villa is beautiful, modern and spacious. All rooms were big suites with plenty of space. The swimming pool was really nice and the garden was also a very big size with a Barbecue kitchen included and direct private access to the beach. The sea was literally at your doorstep.
The best of everything was the service of the employees, specially Wayan.
title: Great villa & great service

text: Five of us stayed in the three bedroom villa. The villa was very modern and spacious with a large front yard that leads to the beach. Staff were very friendly/helpful and the room service food was delicious. Only problem we had with the villa is that there was not enough sun lounges for everybody (only had two for a three bedroom villa).
title: Amazing villa right on the beachfront

owner_response.text:
Greetings Valued Guest,

Thank-you for the splendid review about our your stay at Bali Diamond Villas! 
I'm glad you found the villa up to your standards. 
We appreciate your stay and we hope we can accommodate you again on your next trip to Bali.

I do apologize about the lack of sun lounges in the villa. The villa actually has 6 lounge chairs but the other 4 are kept in storage and are available upon request. In the future my staff will notify all guests of this option when they checkin to avoid  this issue in the future.

If you have any other questions or concerns, or are planning another trip to Bali;
I would appreciate if you could email me directly at: director@balidiamondvillas.com.

I look forward to welcoming you back to Bali Diamond Villas again in the future.

Kind regards, 

Bill Irwin
Managing Director
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: My friends and i stayed here for 3 days and i must say this was one of the best villa stay we ever had. The rooms and the bathroom are really huge! My room even had an outdoor shower accessible from the toilet, how nice! We also had a fun time relaxing in the pool at night. This villa is situated far away from Kuta, the tourist area. So if you want a peaceful and quiet area, this is definitely the place to be. I must say we definitely had a pleasant stay. Last but not least, i must mention that the service staffs in this villa are so warm and helpful. I really want to thank Wayan and the rest of the staff for helping me get a birthday cake and a bouquet of flower for my girlfriend's surprise birthday. All thanks to them, the surprise was a success. Will definitely recommend this villa to my friends, and we will be back another time!
title: Excellent stay at Diamond!

text:
The villa they gave to us was huge and more then we expected, is more than is on pics...We got the Luxury Beach Front villa 4. It was a new one and very clean and tidy. Is what we call luxury :) . The staff there is very friendly and will help you and even exceed all your expectations, they speak good english and will always look to comunicate with you. We really loved to stay there and for our next trip to Bali we will look forward to stay there. 
If you are looking for absolute privacyand relax, then this is the right place to go!
title: Amazing villa and friendly staff

text:
This place is beautiful. 
We loved the views and the staff were very friendly and helpful.

Would definitely come back but only issue was cook made our and all other villas breakfast from our villa. So when we wanted a late breakfast so kids could sleep in, cook still came early to make breakfast for other people in other villas, at one point, she had made 7 other people's breakfast. Luckily they got to sleep in and no noise whilst we were all woken up early. 

However,  I would still come back but make clear with reception that either no breakfast for our villa so we didn't get woken up early OR we stay in the villa the cook doesn't cooks everyone's breakfast from.
title: Beautiful Views

text:
We stayed in the large 5-bed villa #3 and was 7 of us, 2 coupes and 3 teenage boys. We had heaps of space and the property was total luxury with 5 beds with ensuite and massage room. The pool and surround gardens were massive with rear gate opening onto the beach.

The service was excellent with grounds staff and housekeeping constantly maintaining everything.

Breakfast was good but menu was small and staff werent able to slightly vary. Not their fault, I suspect thats what they were instructed. For variety we ate at nearby warung on beach.

Hotel Komune is nearby but food is ordinary. For dinner we ate at Warong Legong which was fantastic and also its neighbour Warung Karung which offered great food at ridiculously cheap prices.

We went to Keramas for surfing but if you didnt surf its hard to see why you would stay here as the beach is black sand and often rubbish on the shoreline. You wouldnt swim in the oecan here at all.

An amazing property for visiting surfers or surfing families.
title: Amazing property

text:
We found this gem on the internet, we were not disappointed.  We stayed in beach front villa number 8 with 3 bedrooms, we chose "our" bedroom (master bedroom upstairs with beach view), the other bedrooms stayed locked (although we had the keys).
The villas are spacious, every villa with a different layout and furniture, all with a large private pool built from dark lava stones (hence the really warm pool water), set in a well maintained garden.

The balcony upstairs overlooks the sea and the beautiful sunrises, which you can also admire from your own (closed) garden which ends where the beach begins.  The place is absolutely quiet, not much to do except surfing (swimming not really recommended because of the big waves) and taking walks on the beach - we loved it.

"Our" villa could do with some renovation although everything you need (and more) is present.  The kitchen isn't really equipped for home cooking or washing up, the upstairs could do with an extra fan at the ceiling or a curtain to keep out the heat - the whole house relies on the airco from downstairs, although each bedroom also has their own airco.  There were 2 large fridges and freezers, and a bottle-machine providing  complimentary hot & cold water.
 
We loved sleeping with open window to hear the waves (and the thunder and sometimes heavy rains).  The bedroom was a fair size with a good bed, the bathroom had warm water every day and a good shower and free amenities, the free WiFi, especially according to Balinese standards, was excellent.  Each bedroom has a TV as does the living room but who watches TV on holiday when you can sit outside and enjoy the warm evening and nights?
Our house had its own gekko, awesome sound!

Breakfast was good and included in the price and was brought to the villa on the time requested.  There could however be some more choice for breakfast without eggs.  

We had dinner delivered a couple of times, everything was good, from pizza to hamburgers to Indonesian food, at reasonable prices.

The staff was plenty and very friendly and helpful, although some have a little trouble speaking English (not a problem though).  There are a couple warungs in the neighbourhood where you can buy drinks and food and day-to-day necessities.  The beach is cleaned every morning,  Anything you need, the staff will arrange for you.

If you are looking for a really quiet spot with a superb view, this is the place to be!
title: Warmest pool ever!

text: OMG these villas are a little piece of heaven. Right on the beach with a beautiful pool, ocean view. The daily breakfast we had was amazing, the villa is spotless clean and the service is perfect. The beds are so comfortable and all rooms are very spacious and coming with your own ensuite. I had the best week ever
title: Conscious Enterprise

text: We stayed in one of the beach villas for a week at the end of February, location was great for surfing. Very clean,  friendly staff. Pool and garden well maintained. Breakfast options were good as well. Easy walk to different food options. Great for families
title: Excellent villas

text:
we been stying at Villa B for several nights, love it,
 
when we arrived we ware so welcomed, amazing staff, very polite. 
The villa was clean, neat, and very pleasant to stay at... The private pool is WOW, the best!!! enjoyed the delicious food and off-course the 2 min walk to the beach for surf... 

I highly recommend Bali Diamond Villa to any couples and Families,... 
I Found myself the best spot for surfing with amazing villa... 

Definitely coming back...
title: love it....

text: I had my wedding and reception party here at Bali Diamond Villas in July. Lets just start by saying how immaculate this place is. It is beautiful with beach front views and a scenic sunrise and villas have very sophisticated modern decors. We had 3 events in total here.  We hosted about 40 guests but it has more capacity if you are looking for something more. The staff were honest, incredible and took very good care of us by answering all our questions, directing us in the right place if we had any questions and also cleaning up after all the events. I could not recommend them enough. They were there to help in every corner. and the perks of being so close to Ubud meant we could take a day trip out there and see all that Ubud and Bali Marine Safari had to offer. Incredible experience, will come and stay here again (or maybe renew our vows one day, hahaha) Thank you so much Bill and your team. We couldn't have ask for anyone better to take care of us.
title: Best Value Wedding Destination in Bali

photos.caption: Reception party night in the 5 bedroom villa

text: We loved the villa! Very kid friendly. We had a family of 5 here. Very clean, lobby staff was VERY helpful will everything from food to laundry to medicine. Even included free breakfast every day! A few close restaurants. Very low kew and relaxing. More of a surfing beach than swimming as the waves are intense. We jumped in a few times after playing in the beautiful black sand!
title: Great Stay! Exceeded Expectations

text: Villas are very nice and fancy. Warm showers and comfy beds are very good. But if you like action, here is not the place for you because it is very quiet and there are not many restaurants or shops around this area. There are a few restaurants along the beach like Komune Resort, where we eat. If you like surfing, this spot offers great waves, night surfing at Kumune is only about a 7 minute walk along the beach. Tip of advice, there is black sand and it gets very hot so remember to wear flip flops.
title: Nice

text: We stayed in a deluxe 3 bedroom villa and it was extremely spacious, very clean and the pool was huge! Each bedroom had its own massive ensuite bathroom and plenty of cupboard and hanging space in the wardrobes. The staff were all very friendly and helpful especially the driver we had that picked us up at the airport. We stayed in the area for a friends wedding but it is quite remote and quiet compared to other parts of Bali. I would recommend stopping at a large supermarket to stock up on supplies as the local supermarket is very small. You can order food from the villa and there is a restaurant next door or a lovely beach club at Komune Resort just a 5 minute walk away along the beach. We would definitely recommend Bali Diamond Villas if your looking to stay in the Keramas area.
title: Fantastic Villa

text: The property is wonderful and uber luxurious. The mist striking thing was how they take customer complaints and feedback seriously. When we complained of pool not being clean, they immediately cleaned it and also offered us a free lunch/drop service for the mistake from their side. We really appreciate the high levels of service provided.
title: Amazing customer service

text:
Excellent position with direct beach access. All the service that you require for the ultimate holiday away from the over the top tourist trap of Kuta and Co!
Peace and quiet, but with access to cool little beach Warungs and of course the famous Komune just 100 metres up the beach! Villa 6 is the one!! 
Villa Bahagia is Bagus!
title: Villa Bahagia is Number 1

text:
We had a three bedroom villa, they are a huge and each room has own shower a toilet. They all have own pool.  I guess those lucky enough would stay for a while and cook etc as it’s well set up for this. We stayed two nights. 
Staff are pleasant as well as the arrival and departure. Have their own drivers which makes things easy if your a surfers wife and want to get your shop on
title: Beautiful

text:
A 3 bedroom villa with a private pool and ample space. Amazing! Staying in this area is truly for a surfing experience as if you don’t surf there is not much else to do. For the price of the villas and the photographs seen, I was a little disappointed on the upkeep of the villas. The grounds were immaculate however the maintenance of the villas was not so great, which was noted on arrival at reception which was full of laundry/towels and confusion.
Breakfast was appalling.......if possible I would suggest you hire your own chef and supply the food, as not once was our order correct and when I say this I mean, 3 fried eggs and 3 pineapple juice ordered, only to receive 3 scrambled eggs and 2 raro orange juice. With no restaurant on site, you need to head out for dinner. The local Wrang and Komune, did not let us down.
title: Beach stay

text:
Wow! What an outstanding villa just perfect for our needs.  After staying in a few hotels and resorts this trip to Bali what a joy it was to arrive at Bali Diamond Villas number 6.

We were two families 7 people in total with 3 kids 12,4,3

Others have mentioned it’s not suitable for kids but honestly it was just perfect for us.

We loved how vast the space was, and the library of books were a fantastic touch! We left a few too!  This place has everything you need if you want to do your own cooking, but mostly we went down to Komune for food.  

Being foodies the only thing that we can really say wasn’t great was the food here. The breakfasts weren’t too out liking or taste quite bland and I guess out sourcing to a family of 7 could be tricky when not dining in a restaurant. Perhaps in the future having the cook come to the villa to make the brekky at a set time might work?
We just found it a bit tasteless and soggy by the time the eggs and bread got to
Us.  It would be great if there was a barista on site for cafe style coffee.. as we had to walk to Komune each morning for a good one.

There was a mention in the book of a spa opening in 2015 but didn’t seem to be one, as a family with kids a nice quiet massage wasn’t an option for us in villa as it would be disruptive, so again we had to visit commune.

Keramas is a bit away from everything so probably only great for surfing families or even people who just want to escape the hustle and bustle of the tourist traps.

We took a driver and visited celuk and Ubud one day, nice easy close trip.

We will definitely be back again
title: Great 4 Days at Keramas

text:
Booked a 2 bedroom beachfront villa through Expedia with flights from UK for 9 nights. Wanted a quiet location with sea views and this Villa fulfilled the brief perfectly. Transfers arranged through Bali Diamond and Made met us in DPS after a great flight from London via KL with Malaysia but a long 1hr + wait to get through immigration. Cost of transfer was around £25 for the hour journey which included a stop in Sanur to stock up on groceries and change some money.. All the staff we met were extremely helpful and friendly. 
Villa number 6 is a 3 bedroom semi-detached property. There was 3 of us in the party and we were able to choose the 2 rooms we wanted - we went for the large downstairs room (Hollywood twin but made up as a super king size) with fabulous bathroom and outdoor shower. We also chose the front upstairs seaview room with Balcony.The rooms were spacious and the large kitchen was fully equipped. We loved having a cold drinking water dispenser (which saves a lot of plastic bottles) and an ice dispenser. We did however miss having a washing machine. There are TVs in all rooms with large selection of worldwide channels. Wi-fi is good for Bali. we lost both Wi-fi and TV for a few days but this was due to a main cable being cut in the area.
The outside space was terrific with a large pool you good do laps in, 4 sun loungers and a 2nd upper infinity pool with direct views onto the beach and ocean. There was also a large eating terrace and further 1st floor balcony and terrace with sea views. We had sun in all areas until around 1630. The flours and plants were beautiful.
The included breakfast was ordered the day before and was high quality and always delivered with a smile. We tried dinner one night which was also good but the menu quite limited. They are trying new menu items which they asked us to sample and this was good so hopefully the menu will be increased soon. There is no sign of the cocktail bar in the Website  due to open 2014 (sic) 
The location for us was just what we wanted with a couple of Warungs and the great Komune Beachclub (where they did night surfing) all around 5 mins walk from the hotel. The amazing Warang Legong on the main road was a 15 min walk but they came and collected you or delivered their amazing food. The beach was the sparkly black volcanic sand and unfortunately suffered from a lot of rubbish washed up after most high tides (as in many areas of Bali). There seemed to be a positive effort for a daily clean up but clearly this is a challenging problem in Indonesia. The cooling breezes were a real plus, the roar of the waves was soothing and there were no mosquitos.
title: Stylish modern ocean front Bali Villa

owner_response.text:
Thanks for this thoughtful and thorough review! 
We appreciate the detailed information for future guests.

Thank you for your patience in regards to the wifi outage, it was tough for us in the office too. 

We hope to welcome you back again next year and hopefully improve on your experience. 

I do apologize that the front desk didn't inform you of the cocktail bar and lounge located above our lobby. (Definitely an oversight on our part!)

Thanks again for choosing Bali Diamond Villas as your holiday destination.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: We stayed here for 3 nights in Villa number 6. The place is absolutely beautiful and has everything you can think of. You will have your own private beach and an amazing ocean view. It`s an amazing experience !!!!!
title: Excellent service and amazing view

text: Villa Bahagia is an absolute gem!! From the moment we arrived and walked through the doors we could tell we were in for a treat... clean, comfortable and the best location. We had our very own pool to relax and swim in whilst listening to the crash of the waves... walk out back gate and we were on the sparkly black sand with a short stroll to swim in the ocean. Restaurants on either side of us and massage that spoil you at villa bahagia... cannot wait to come back... keremas is the new black!!!!
title: SAM

text: Stayed here for 4 nights in January in Villa number 6. The villa itself was absolutely amazing, with everything that you could ever ask for including a water filter. The highlight of the villa was definitely the pool and the second plunge pool overlooking the beach. Yes, this place is quite far away from everything however, it was a great start to our holiday in Bali. The staff were extremely helpful and very kind with breakfast being delivered and set out for us everyday. The pool, garden and villa were cleaned daily.
title: Gorgeous villa

text: The villa itself was absolutely gorgeous and nothing was too much trouble for the staff there. Only issue was that it was a lot further away from everything than I had originally thought, so took a bit of travelling back and forth.
title: Wonderful villa

text:
When you have a vila with a pool, and walking distance to vulcanic sand beach with great waves to surf... what can we say? Let me get back there!!!
The place is perfect for good vacations, good surf, good relaxing moments. We stayed a group of friends, and the vila was very good for 7 adults and one 4 year old kid. We stayed on the older villas (not the beachfront ones) and it was ok - needing a renewal but the price difference for the new ones did not justify - I would still make the same decision now. The down side was the cleanliness of one of the rooms, was not really good.
The staff was very friendly, and always trying to help making our live better.
title: Top stay!

text: Stayed here 4 nights in November. The villa was clean and decent. The highlights are the pool, which is quite large and obviously the lovely location which is just on the beach. Some good extras are that the breakfast was really good (try the mie goreng) and if you need to do some work, the Internet was very fast which was a pleasant surprise. Normally the Internet in Bali isn’t particularly great. While not exactly closest to the busy areas, if you are looking to have a relaxing time with family or friends, this place is great.
title: Great place to get away

text:
This spot is awesome! We got a villa for 4 of us with its own pool, big rooms and open plan kitchen/lounge. A cool place if you really just want to relax away from all of the commotion that can be bali.

We had a breakfast service included, delivered to our villa each morning what we had ordered the night before, and the friendly staff would bring over Bintang when we had run out ;)

A quick 5min walk along the beach to Komune resort you will reach the main surf break and there are a couple of good little warungs on the beachfront with cheap food.
title: Modern beachfront villas

text: We stayed here for 9 nights and absolutely loved the villas. They were really spacious and had great facilities for a home from home holiday. They were not close to the main attractions but it is easy to arrange transportation. We were lucky enough to be upgraded to the 5 bedroom villa.
title: Beachfront with an amazing pool

text: We are family 2 adults and 4 young kids of 13,12,10, and 8, came to Bali for the first time and we stayed Bali Diamond Villas. We upgraded to the 5 bdrm oceanfront villa from our original ocean view unit. We loved every minute at Bali Diamond.
title: Awesome family vacation at Bali Diamond Villas

text: Beautiful villas worth five stars. We stayed in a five-room. Sea view. Bath was big and wonderful swimming. My family was happy during their stay. The sea was literally on your doorstep. I thank the staff at the service of Mr. Bell and to the lowest employee
title: The Villa is beautiful

text:
My family and I stayed here for 2 nights. We took the luxurious beach front villa and it was indeed luxurious! It was one of the most pleasant stay and we wanted to stay there longer. I was communicating via email with Arie even before the trip. She was prompt with her response and elaborately explained all my queries. Throughout the stay, the staffs and Arie made sure our stay was a pleasant one. They were always smiling and willing to help out with any queries or request. 

Villa 6 and Villa 9 are closely similar, but each villa has its own unique design and furniture. The private pool, the interior design, the kitchen with it's fully furnished equipment and the ocean view was simply awesome. Tours or transports can be arranged by the villa management. Spa services can be also be requested to be done in your villa with an affordable price. Food for breakfast was okay but we felt the dinner was better. 

The villa is equipped with almost all the things you need throughout the stay, except for toiletries and groceries to cook. Insects may fly into your villa at night, but the villa has ample insect repellent of various forms to chase them away. Both sunrise and sunset could be witnessed from the villa and the crashing sound of waves would bring peace to the whole place. Although construction is still going on around the villa, you can hardly hear any noise as the waves would be overpowering it. 

Overall, I would highly recommend this place for people who come in groups. There is nothing much around the villa, so I would suggest it for people who do not want to be located in the touristy areas. Hiring a vehicle from the villa management and touring Bali would be a great option for families or travelers in groups. They even have a huge van which can accommodate up to 10 pax. Ask around and research on the venue before heading somewhere. Sometimes, drivers tend to bring you to places where they get commission and it would usually be a little more expensive. You could also ask the villa staffs or Arie for suggestions. Be sure to be back to enjoy the facilities in the villa. 

Definitely coming back here to enjoy their fully renovated resort!
title: Awesome Service and Beautiful Villa

photos.caption: This is what you see when you wake up !
View of kitchen from the patio
Kitchen with room service for dinner
Waves of Keramas beach and the unique black sand which shines!
Sunset from the beach, in front of the villa
Sunrise from the beach, in front of the villa
View of sunrise from the master bedroom

text:
these villas are magnificent 
huge fully equipped amazing location
the staff are all great, friendly helpful well trained.
special mention to arie who is  delight and so helpful.
bill was great too and although there was construction disruption to our stay and inconvenience was very minimal
would recommend this place for groups of friends for surfers for people who like their privacy for families and for romantic getaways
you won't believe how well appointed the villas are
the pools are fabulous huge and the garden settings are beautiful 
the ocean roars you to sleep at night and the beach sparkles
title: a slice of paradise with all the comforts

text:
Awesome villa right by the beach!
Big rooms and a large plunge pool. Super clean and tidy.
I don't know why people have reviewed the kitchen here as the staff can bring u great food for cheap whenever u ask.
The kitchen is modern and fine by the way.
The staff are unbelievable! Super friendly and attentive!
I loved the phone calls of an evening or of a morning to see if we needed beer/food/transport or information.
U can also walk up the beach to kommune for food and out to warung lagong. There is a circle k type shop at the end of the rd if u want anything else.
All in all I couldn't recommend this enough for surfers or couples. No hawkers either!
title: What a spot!

owner_response.text:
Thank you very much Scott, Angela and Laura, we are def look forward for your return. Your great review is much appreciated which giving us more value and challenge to keep it up.

Enjoy the wave in Canggu and have a great day!

Best Regards,
Arie (Ms)
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: A couple of friends and I stay at the Bali Diamond Villas at Keramas for only a couple days, but it was by far the best accommodation we came across. It was a little pricy but the money was well worth it. The staff that works there couldn't of been more helpful and inviting. They honestly made us feel like royalty...we seriously didn't have to lift a finger. The other sweet part about staying at the Diamond was the unreal waves literally breaking in our front yard. Overall it was an awesome trip and fully recommend staying here. Thanks again Arie from Chad n all the boys from Big Island you made it happen!
title: This spot is mental and not to mention the waves breaking twenty yards from your doorstep!

owner_response.text:
We are glad that you are enjoyed our Diamond Villas as well as the wave.
We are looking forward to servicing you again in future. Thank you very much and appreciated for your review.

Best Regards,
Arie (Ms)
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
We had a girls 10 day stay in June & couldn't have picked a better place. We stayed in villa no 4, one row back from the beautiful black Keramas beach. 

The villa provided a house boy, Komang, who was just a delight, he looked after us, we didn't have to do a thing. He even climbed the coconut tree to retrieve a coconut for us, that is going above & beyond as far as I am concerned.

The villa itself is in a walled area, with its own sparkling pool, it has three king size beds with ensuites. Two are downstairs, while the other is upstairs, it has a lovely balcony that we used for our afternoon happy hour.

It has a great kitchen, not that we used it much, except to mix drinks, lol. The lounge area is comfy with tv & dvd player & you step out the door, into the glistening pool.

Warong Legong, a local restaurant, owned by Kadeck, serves delicious food, he delivers to the villa as well. The Nasi gorneg was the best.

Miss Sue & Mr Ray have left a folder with suggestions of where to go & what to do..... do yourself a favour & treat it as the bible, there are lots of great suggestions, we did a lot of them.

Overall, a fantastic place to stay,thanks to Sue & Ray,  I will definitely be back.
title: Luxury at No 4

photos.caption: its the nice touches that count

text: Before staying here, ask yourself if you want a secluded place to hang out on the beach with hardly any tourists, if the answer is yes, then stay here. If you want more touristy and populated with lots of restaurant options, go somewhere else. This place has a lot of potential, but it's not quite up to that full potential yet. We were in one of the back villas which is not right on the water, but only a few minutes' walk once you step out the door of the villa. The back villas are the old ones and could use some renovations, however that's not to say they aren't nice. Extremely spacious-perfect for families or three couples. The furniture could use some updating as our couch was just an outdoor lounge sofa (inside) and the cushion was not very thick. The towels weren't that great and they have limited beach/pool towels. The dining table was nice-seats 6. Kitchen ware could also use some updating. All of this stuff wouldn't matter that much if there were other places to go eat and hang out, but the options are extremely limited right now because this is a new area being built up right now. So, if you're looking for a real "getaway"-this place is perfect, but I highly recommend stopping by a grocery store on your way in so that you're stocked up on food/snacks as there is not much at the hotel yet. They do serve food, but they're limited to only a few options. About 3-5 min walk down the beach you run into Komune which is another hotel and they do have a nice restaurant (AMAZING burgers!!!) so you're not totally at a loss. The night surfing is fun to watch. The black sand here is AWESOME!!!! Never seen anything like it. So sparkly-like diamonds :) Bali Diamond Estates only has a few beach chairs to lay out on and you have to ask them to bring them down. Since this place is still under construction I guess you can't expect all the same amenities of a regular hotel, so I am excited to see how it changes in the next few months. The construction manager said most of the villas will be finished by Dec 2013-so it's noisy. Also, there is not a lot of privacy in the villas. Other guests or the workers could see into our villa bedrooms/pool-so I guess you just need to shut the curtains to have privacy. One other thing is that the hotel staff kept calling us all the time asking if we wanted to order food or other random things. The calls started by 8am. We prefer to sleep in when we're on vacation, so when the phone is ringing just to check on us-it gets a little annoying. We made a comment about it on the hotel comment card (and unplugged the phone) so hopefully they fixed that issue. It is sooo nice to be able to leave the doors open at night since they have screen doors so that you can fall asleep to the ocean! I'd like to try one of the new villas next time, and I would stay here again-but I'll wait until after Dec.
title: This place has potential!

text:
I visited the Bali Diamond Estates with a friend this May and was very impressed by the quality of the villa. While there was construction it didn't bother me as it stopped and started during hours that I wanted to be up and out anyways. 

The beach is black sand and is quite stunning, there are several places to eat just down the beach and the staff and manager can pretty much get you anything you might need or want.

Great experience, thank you for the stay!
title: Truly spectacular

text:
We live in Bali and decided to have a night up the coast. I stumbled on these villas on booking.com. They were honest, and said that there was work being done, but offered a fair price and upgraded us as well. 

Putting the construction aside, these are beautiful villas. They face the ocean and are set on huge blocks. The beach itself is not clean, but the black sand is stunning and if the villa owners can keep the area in front clean, it would go a long way. But at the moment there is a lot of construction going on, so understand it would be very hard right now. Still, the walk along the beach in the morning is gorgeous, I suggest getting up early to appreciate it.

The villa we stayed in was huge, enough for three couples or a family. The pool is equally large, and we were allowed to bring our golden retriever, who gave the yard the paws up.

Beds are comfortable and it is nicely decorated, if somewhat eclectic. Employing someone with some coordination taste might help, as the silver painting does not go with the rest of the decor!

The main issue for these owners will be maintenance, as the doors were stiff and warped already. There is also  the issue of the step out of them, which is very dangerous and needs to be extended, with the one inch lip removed.

We were told the construction would finish at 5pm, but had to ask them at 6.30pm, which was not good. The grinding of the tiles being cut was annoying and the next day it all got very noisy with either side going with equipment.

But, we were warned and despite that, had a lovely time.

The driver is very expensive, best to hire your own. 350k for return into Ubud was steep, but next time we will bring our own.

Breakfast was nasi goreng only, apparently they were out of bacon, but it was fresh and nice. We also had lunch by the pool which was tasty and fresh too.

Staff were very helpful. It is very much self contained though, as you would need to walk up to security to ask for something (I think!)  

All in all, once a couple more are finished, this will be superb. It is worthwhile checking out and then spending the day in Ubud before heading back south, or head north and explore that part of the island. At just 60 minutes from the airport, this is a gem in the making, albeit not quite there yet.

Recommended if you can tolerate building noise. For some of the time, the waves and fountain drowned it out, each day will bring its own levels.
title: A diamond still in the making

text: Dejlig villa, egen pool, fantastisk udsigt til havet og de mega surfbølger, som betyder at for os ikke-surfere frarådes det at svømme i havet, sort strand som ses på billede. Dejlig balinesisk morgenmad og super venlige personale altid klar med tips og ideer til en udflugt.
title: Bali 2018

text: Это мечта для спокойного размеренного отдыха. Великолепный интерьер, все на месте. Вид изумительный, персонал душевный. Бассейны на двух уровнях, море 10 метров от выхода из отеля. Искупался, лег на шикарном лежаке около своего бассейна, народу никого. Мечта. Жарко, нырнул в бассейн, если до моря в лом идти. Персонал тут как тут, коктейль, воды или ещё, что пожелаете? Супер. Прям загородная дача. Могут помочь с арендой авто и другими проблемами. Реально советую. Не пожалеете.
title: Bali Diamond

text:
1. 泳池大, 房間大, 新穎, 現代感, staff 訓練良好
2. 地方有點偏遠, 晚上無法外出
3. 建議吃Hotel的晚餐服務
title: 漂亮的現代風格Villa

text: Побывали там большой компанией И каждый остался в восторге от этой виллы. Единственное, что смутила так это абсолютно прозрачная ванна и туалет без намека на перегородку. Кровати очень мягкие простыни всегда свежие, завтрак приносили прямо в номер. Долго пыталась найти фен, пришлось прямиком из душа бегать по территории к администраторам но это мелочь. Рядом не было магазинчиков(только через дорогу вдалеке) и большого выбора развлекательных заведений тоже не было -зато был дельфинарий и рядом аренда серфинга -из развлечений это все
title: Пляж с черным песком

text: 空間大,維護尚可,服務人員態度及素質佳,房間看出去就是海景非常漂亮,只是這邊的海灘是黑沙,跟KUTA的白沙不同,沒這麼漂亮,離市區有些距離,需要包車或其他交通工具,早餐可再加強,整體上算滿意
title: 服務佳,飯店漂亮

text: im rahmen eines bali trips waren wir 4 nächte im diamond estates, allerdings nicht in den luxury beachfront villas - die haben wir nur kurz vor ort angeschaut und es dann schon bereut, dass wir nicht diese gewählt haben. allerdings war sowohl in den luxury villas als auch am eingang des geländes eine baustelle. diese hat unseren aufenthalt jedoch nicht gestört ! was allerdings suspekt war, dass bei der ankunft nicht wirklich jemand den check in gemacht hat sondern wir nur von einem room boy zu unserer villa geführt wurden und dort erwartete uns dann ausser einem leeren kühlschrank auch ein extrem ungemütliches (hartes) bett. insgesamt war es sehr sauber und gepflegt und die villa wurde auch jeden tag geputzt. das frühstück war nicht sehr gut, das wurde immer von einem kleinen cafe am eingang des geländes von den room boy direkt zur villa gebracht und mit folie eingepackt - nicht sehr schmackhaft und auch nicht besonders gut. insgesamt war es aber ruhig - der strand ist zum surfen bestimmt hammer aber sehr plastik - verseucht. die umliegenden restaurants (nur wenige) sind sehr teuer ! wir waren froh dass wir nicht länger gebleiben sind !
title: bali trip
